A4.text: In 2000 he won gold at the Sydney Olympics by defeating Mukhtarkhan Dildabekov of Kazakhstan on points.

A5.text: Won the Super Heavyweight Gold Medal representing Great Britain at the 2000 Olympics in Sydney, Australia.
